personal.name: Badoiu Valentin
personal.title: Creative Developer & Digital Artist
personal.bio: Hey everyone, I'm Valentin, the creative mind behind Steampunk Penguin! A creator, dreamer, and eternal explorer of ideas. I specialize in AI-enhanced digital art, web development, and bringing imaginative concepts to life through technology.

testimonials.text: Working with Valentin was a truly transformative experience. His ability to capture the 'sincerity of harmony' in his visuals is breathtaking. He doesn't just create images; he crafts 'visions where boundaries blur,' transporting you to another realm.
testimonials.author: Creative Director

testimonials.text: Valentin's work is a journey through 'the space you don't have,' a profound exploration of imagination. He has a gift for finding beauty in the ephemeral, like 'a trip in the clouds,' and capturing the essence of 'a free soul born from a drop of water.'
testimonials.author: Digital Artist
